writeBytes

public Encoder writeBytes(ByteBuffer buffer)
                   throws IOException
Description copied from interface: Encoder
Writes out the remaining bytes in ByteBuffer. The given ByteBuffer is untounch after this method is returned (i.e. same position and limit).

Specified by:
